Html: I'm trying to help a friend of mine optimize his enhance shaman DPS. The two weapons he currently has available are Aledar's Battlestar and Pride. When I run the Optimize tool, it recommends that he equip Aledar's Battlestar for both his main hand and off hand, even though he only has one Battlestar. Is there a way to indicate that he he only has one Battlestar? Or is this an issue with the optimizer? Thanks for helping me out.
Right Click the item, Edit, check Unique, OK.
